keyword: how many calories are in a clementine
title: How Many Calories Are in a Clementine?
meta_description: Discover how many calories are in a clementine, including carbs, fiber, sugars, protein, and full nutrition breakdown per fruit.
h1: How Many Calories Are in a Clementine?
assumptions: Medium-sized clementine (about 74 g edible portion), raw, peeled, no added sugar or toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by size, variety, ripeness, and growing conditions. Check labels for packaged products.

quick_answer.text: One medium clementine provides about 35 kcal, mostly from natural sugars and carbs.

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaged fruits.

faqs.q: How many calories are in a clementine?
faqs.a: About 35 kcal for one medium clementine.
Yes, one has 8.9 g carbs, with 1.7 g fiber and 6.8 g natural sugars.

faqs.q: How much vitamin C in a clementine?
faqs.a: One medium clementine provides about 36 mg of vitamin C, over half the daily needs.

faqs.q: Do clementines have fat or protein?
faqs.a: Very low: 0.2 g fat and 0.6 g protein per fruit.
Similar; a small orange has about 45 kcal, slightly more than a clementine.
